sector.narrative: Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children

title.narrative: Pakistan United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Pakistan Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Child Protection)
UNICEF Programmes in Pakistan (Emergencies Disaster Risk Reduction)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Pakistan: End of Programme Evaluation on Promoting Child Rights in Cotton Farming Areas (CRCFA) Programme of Pakistan
2019 Pakistan: Reach Every District (RED)/Reach Every Community (REC) Strategy Evaluation Pakistan (2014-18)
Pakistan 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Pakistan Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF child protection staff and resources were effectively deployed and monitored, with 100 per cent HACT assurance activities completed as per plan, fund utilization of 100 per cent for RR and ORE, and 96 per cent for ORR. UNICEF staff worked effectively in partnership with government counterparts, non-governmental implementing partners, and with sister UN agencies in support of child protection outcomes across Pakistan. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of donor reports submitted on time
Percentage of financial utilization against the plan as defined in rolling workplans
Percentage of mandatory HACT assurance activities completed.
